desc: Hello,For a client project, we are currently looking for an independent actress or a video producer in order to shoot a testimonial video as part of an advertisement campaign for an online service. The actress will have to act as a happy customer of the service by reading a text in front of the camera.Scope of work includes:- shooting a 2-3 minute advertisement video with a junior (unknown) actress (age 18-50) - MUST- editing the video (adding text, graphics, music) - OPTIONAL- video final cutting and embbeding in HD ( .MOV, .MPEG4, MP4 or .AVI) - OPTIONALWe will provide:- the text to be read in front of the camera by the actress;- the text, graphics and music to be added in the video if you also edit the video- overall direction about the video concept and production (tone, pace, transitions, locations, etc..)Important note:- the actress must have a perfect spoken English (either British, US or India accent);- the video will be available publicly (on website, Youtube, etc..) so we may request a duly signed written authorisation from the actress to use her image publicly;- we will request at least 3 sets of the shooting to choose the best video sequences;Miscellaneous:- Deadline: flexible but ideally within a month;- Budget: flexible depending on the scope of work you take over;- Other: we may need other video shootings after this project, so if we are happy with your work we will continue with you;
title: Shoot advertisement video with actress in English

desc: I want to create an explanatory video for an app which we are looking to gain funding for. The video should not be more than 2 minutes. Send samples of your work with pricing. This is a low budget jobBelow is the app details for which we want the explanatory videoThe project scope for “Donate to a cause” is a simple one. There are 3 aspects in this application, the Donor, the Recipient Organization  and the Delivery channel.Recipient Organization will be a non-profit organization that is involved in social and humanitarian work, they will apply to be registered on the “Donate to a cause” platform along with the necessary paperwork. On approval, they will have their profile visible to the public and be eligible to request or receive donations .It has to be noted that all Donations are only in kind and not in cash.Donors are the general public, they create a profile and will be able to logon and donate, they can donate to a particular Recipient Organization or if they do not select the Recipient Organization the system will offer it to the Recipient Organizations requiring that particular donation. The Recipient Organization that accepts the donation first will be the recipient of the donation.Delivery Channel are a set of registered drivers that have applied to be part of the Delivery Channel network and have all their required documentation verified by “Donate to a cause”. Once the recipient of the donation has been identified, the system will send out a notification to the nearest Delivery Channel drivers to notify them of a pickup and drop-off of a donation and invite them to accept the call.  The task will be assigned to the first driver that accepts this invitation. At the point of acceptance, the driver can choose to deliver free of charge or with a reasonable charge.  If chargeable, then the Recipient Organization will be responsible to make the payment on receipt of the goods.
title: Create a explanatory video

desc: I need an HTML5 video player to be used e.g. with Netflix, to improve language learning for my family.I'm thinking of these key features:- Play double subtitles (e.g. EN, ITA), font size adjustable- Play at a slower pace (example. [url removed, login to view] ), up to [url removed, login to view]- Play XX seconds of movie with, English audio, then keep the image STILL and play the same XX seconds of the Italian audio only (keeping the double subtitle still)It should do this automatically, ideally at every change of the subtitles (i.e. the timeline of the subtitles controls this "back and forth" sequence), with a couple of controls such as "add 1 or 2 second tolerance when playing the second audio", choice of audio 1 and audio 2 order, play at a slower pace only audio 1.It should work as an extension of Chrome being able to play a file either from Netflix (see [url removed, login to view] for instance) or from a local/LAN folder, or from a webserver running on the PC if HTML5 does not grant access to local files.
title: Player for HTML5 video: 2 audio, 2 subs
